Alteration 3

Bless/Buff: Luck
 
(No Effect on Undead [undeadimmune], May Use Underwater [uwok], No effect on Inanimate [inanimateimmune])
The caster changes the future fates of some soldiers close by. Those affected have a very good chance of escaping blows or magic that would otherwise have killed them. Luck does not affect undead or inanimate creatures as they are dead already.
